title: Which Rioters will be coming to PAX East 2015?
body:
It still stinks that Riot won't have a booth or host an after party but its awesome to hear they'll be around meeting fans and what not. I was wondering how many of them will actually be attending and more specifically will any of the art team be there? I love meeting Rioters (Had a blast last year with some) but this year I would really love to meet some of the art team seeing I'm currently in school for game art and would love to pursue a career at Riot Games one day. I'd love to ask them questions and get an idea of what Riot expects from interns/employees from a person perspective.

Hope to see and hang with you guys at PAX!

replies.body: I'll be there for fun (and cosplaying!)

Oh awesome! Who will you be going as? Maybe I'll see you! I was going to go as Jax but I don't think my outfit will be done in time, I'm probably resorting to an older cosplay of a MTG character or Corvo from dishonored
Have faith! I'm still putting together bits and pieces of mine. I'm doing classic Lux, and it's my first time making armor ._.;; If you run into me, feel free to say hi! :D

Ok Ill keep an eye out! I love seeing league cosplays, last year there was some really good ones, a lot of talented cosplayers out there.   Also hey is there any word of a party or pub-crawl? I recall there was speaking of one but Im not sure if it was ever decided : (

Yes! There's a ton of talented people at PAX East! My friend is doing an awesome Jayce cosplay (the one that's on the front page of the LoL subreddit!)

I'm actually not sure about parties and whatnot. I'm only aware of the speaker panels and Cospitality Lounge at the expo itself.

Yeah I wish I was as talented as some of cosplayers out there!
As for the party thing Ill just keep my eyes open and pray to Urf. XD
